message.body: Yeah i'm at work so give me a call after 7. I have some stuff you can borrow.
Great, thanks!
Sorry I didn't call last night, had to meet with my sm after rehearsal. Can I call at 7 tonight?
Can you txt me yr addy? Thx!
On my way!
Would it be possible to plug a light and then 2 clamps into the dimmer?
Depends on the wattage of the cliplights. If they're 60 watts its fine, if 100 that might be too much
Great, we won't do that then! Hope yr show went well tonight! And thanks again!
Would we be able to shoot video on the green screen on Thursday?
sure. but let me check with mark to make sure he's not doing anything that day
Thx!
do you still plan on shooting today?
If that's ok?
sure just checkin. i wont be home until 6.30 but i left a key in the mailbox. and mark should be home sometime soon
Awesome, we won't be there till 7:30. Thx!
Could I come by Thursday around 5 for lights?
thursday around five works. our rehearsal start at 6 so as long as it's before then
Perfect. Thx!
You guys still going with the rain?
no but you should still get to work early
good for the soul
Boo :-( sorry you aren't going. Happy birthday! Are you guys partyin down later? I'm already almost there, so thanks for forcing me outta bed! I woulda slept all day....
Can I raid yr gel box again?
...also would it be possible to borrow yr long VGA cable?
yes and yeah sure
when can you do it? tomorrow morning?
Yes, tomorrow morn is fine, whenever is good for you!
Jus lemme know what time to swing by!
No, I'm free until 6
ok. do you have a rehearsal schedule to work around?
cool. then lets do it in a few hours if thats cool
Are you at yr place perchance? Gotta drop off keys and I think mark is out
i'm at work, sorry. i thought mark would be home though
He is, finally gottaholda him. Thx!
where's the party again?
nice. i'ma be there soon
We're playin pool at buffalo billiards, front and chestnut
Coo, we just got hurr
don't hurt yrself we can meet up during the week when you're better. drink some v8 and feel better
Heya! Any chance yr around today or tomorrow and I could borrow like 3 gels?
tomorrow morning or tomorrow night might work, the gels are up at my studio at 9th and dauphin
Oh ok! Maybe tomorrow morning? It's no big deal if it's going to be a hassle.
i'm going to be there to pick stuff up at 9 anyway. Or zac mifgt be working there this weekend
Cool, I'll see what Zac says and if he's not gonna be there I can come by at 9 tomorrow
